casebody.data:
A. C. RENT-A-CAR, INC., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. The AMERICAN NATIONAL BANK & TRUST COMPANY OF MOBILE et al., Defendants-Appellees, The CURRY CORPORATION, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. The AMERICAN NATIONAL BANK & TRUST COMPANY OF MOBILE et al., Defendants-Appellees. No. 72-2380. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. June 8, 1973. Frederick O. Scheske, Miami, Fla., for plaintiff s-appellants. Mayer W. Perloff, Oliver J. Latour, Jr., Harry H. Riddick, Mobile, Ala., for defendants-appellees.

Before WISDOM, DYER and INGRAHAM, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

This Court having carefully reviewed the evidence presented to the district court below sitting without a jury, we find the district court’s memorandum of Findings of Fact and Conclusions of Law, 339 F.Supp. 506, to be correct, and the judgment is hereby

Affirmed.
